resources.string: This application is made to help tourists visit Breda on their own. There are multiple routes to choose from on the route selection screen, which will, after selected, automatically show on the map.
A walking route along the history of Breda. A short walk through the center that will introduce you to the profound culture and history of this beautiful city.
The route of the Blind Walls
The route of the Blind Walls
This app needs the Location permission, please accept to use location functionality.
This application requires an internet connection to function.
